about_the_game:
20MTD: Emberpath is a Lovecraftian roguelike where you play as one of many wanderers that must mow through hordes of horrors to explore the lands.
This 20 Minutes Till Dawn spin-off offers a condensed Action RPG experience, with its deep play choice and theorycrafting potential. Evolve your powers and acquire legendary loot as you wander the cosmic apocalypse.

Features


  • Create a unique build every game. With a strong focus on replayability, the large variety of characters, abilities and artifacts, will offer a novel experience every time you start up a new run.
  • Build for your playstyle. Rain down giant swords from the sky, or command an army of skeletal warriors, or wield explosive fire magic to set ablaze every horror in sight... the possibilities are endless!
  • Quick, 20-minute, play sessions that can satisfy your Action RPG urges in a condensed package.
  • Auto-firing abilities lets you experience high octane gameplay without tiring out your precious gamer hands.
  • Collect souls and forge them into new abilities from the goddess of flames.
  • Rare artifacts are hidden across the world. Find sets of artifacts to gain powerful passive effects.

short_description: 20MTD: Emberpath is a spin-off of the acclaimed 20 Minutes Till Dawn. In this roguelike, you combine different abilities and artifacts to create an almighty character that can mow down waves of Lovecraftian creatures. Can you hold out against the horde, until the night is over?
